org.gvsig.tools.identitymanagement

Interface SimpleIdentityManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSimpleIdentityManager, DumbIdentityManager

    public interface SimpleIdentityManager

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Collection getActions()
      Return a list of the actions that are registered.
      SimpleIdentity getAdministrator() 
      SimpleIdentity getCurrentIdentity()
      Return the identity of the current session in the system.

      Authenticate the identity in the system and stablish a session with this identity.
      void logout()
      Closes the session stablised with the current identity.

      Inform if the login process require a domain name.

      Register the actionName as an action that require authorization.

      Run the specified action as the specified identity.

    • Method Detail

      • login

        void login(String domain,
         String identityid,
         String password)
           throws UnauthorizedException
        Authenticate the identity in the system and stablish a session with this identity. If the identityid don't exists or the password specified is incorrect, throw a exception. If the domain is not required it can not be null.
        Parameters:
        domain, - the domain used to authenticate the user
        identityid, - identity id to login in the system
        password -
        Throws:
        UnauthorizedException

      • logout

        void logout()
        Closes the session stablised with the current identity.

      • getCurrentIdentity

        SimpleIdentity getCurrentIdentity()
        Return the identity of the current session in the system. Can't be null.
        Returns:
        the current identity

      • getAdministrator

        SimpleIdentity getAdministrator()

      • needDomain

        boolean needDomain()
        Inform if the login process require a domain name.
        Returns:
        true if a domain name is required.

      • sudo

        void sudo(String domain,
        String identityid,
        Runnable acction)
        Run the specified action as the specified identity.
        Parameters:
        domain -
        identityid -
        acction -

      • registerAction

        void registerAction(String actionName)
        Register the actionName as an action that require authorization.
        Parameters:
        actionName -

      • getActions

        Collection getActions()
        Return a list of the actions that are registered.
        Returns:
        list of action names that requiere authorization.
